newAccount: Please create a World Community Grid account at https://www.worldcommunitygrid.org or modify an existing one with this username: {{username}} and make sure that you have chosen the 'Display my data' option on My Profile page. Step by step guide can be seen on wiki page https://wiki.byteball.org/WCG_distribution#A_quick_guide_to_linking_your_wallet_with_WCG
usernameCanBeChanged: You can change it later if you desire. Click on the link below when done.
accountLinked: Your WCG account is successfully linked.
insertAddress: Please insert the address you want to use as payout address (click on '...' button and then click on 'Insert my address')
setupComplete: Setup complete! Periodically, rewards proportional to your contribution to World Community Grid project under the account {{accountName}} (ID: {{accountID}}) will be sent to your payout account.
enterNewUsername: Please enter new username for your WCG account ID {{accountID}}
accountCheckFailed: Account check failed. Please make sure that you set {{accountName}} as username and that you have chosen the 'Display my data' option on My Profile page.
scoreFetchingFailed: Unable to get your WCG score for the ongoing distribution. Please make sure your username is: {{accountName}} and that you have chosen the 'Display my data' option on My Profile page.
payoutForCurrentWork: A payout of {{amountByte}}GB and {{amountAsset}} {{labelAsset}} was made to reward your contribution.
errorOccurred: An unexpected error occurred. Admin is notified. Please try again in a few hours.
seemsUnresponsive: Error, World Community Grid seems unresponsive. Please retry later.
usernameMismatch: This username doesn't correspond to the WCG account ID {{accountID}}
notValidAddress: This is not a valid address.
fixUsernameMismatch: The username: {{accountName}} doesn't correspond to ID {{accountID}}. You won't receive payouts until you correct this issue or link your new WCG account.
visitWiki: For more information, please visit our wiki: https://wiki.byteball.org/WCG_distribution
payoutForPreviousWork: A payout of {{amountByte}}GB and {{amountAsset}} {{labelAsset}} was made to reward your previous contribution to World Community Grid.
